explains: n. [光][天] 亮度；聪明，活泼；鲜艳；愉快
wordGroup: apparent brightness 视亮度；表观亮度

sentences.en: The star varies in brightness by about three magnitudes.
sentences.cn: 星体的亮度大约分三个星等。

sentences.en: Her burst of exuberance and her brightness overwhelmed me.
sentences.cn: 她的活力勃发和她的聪明智慧征服了我。

sentences.en: But his night paintings don't exactly lack brightness.
sentences.cn: 但他的夜景画并不缺乏亮度。
